questions.question: What is the main argument of dependency theory regarding the global economic structure?
options: It perpetuates inequality between developed and developing countries
It promotes economic growth in the Third World
It fosters independence for developing nations
questions.answer: It perpetuates inequality between developed and developing countries

questions.question: Which policy is often recommended by dependency theorists to reduce external dependency?
Which African country implemented Ujamaa as a self-reliance strategy?

options: It underestimates internal factors contributing to underdevelopment
questions.answer: It underestimates internal factors contributing to underdevelopment

options: Maintaining independence from Cold War blocs
